title: Report finalised; await submission to President soon
body_lines: The report prepared by the Presidential Task Force working on 'One Country-One Law' was attested by its Chairman and members yesterday.
Accordingly, the report was signed by the Task Force Head, Ven. Galagodaaththe Gnanasara Thera and the members.
The report is due to be submitted to the President soon. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
